metadata.ground_truth: Frankie and Bennys is not in the best part of town, and the view from the restaurant is of a parking lot, but it is a 10 minute walk from other city sights.
metadata.predicted: The location of Frankie and Bennys is not very good according to one customer, but another said it was great.

conversation.content: Hello, I am looking for an expensive restaurant on the south side of town.
Frankie and Bennys serves Italian food, it is in the South Part of town, and the price range is expensive. Can I help you with anything else?
Is it in a good location to the sights?
The location of Frankie and Bennys is not very good according to one customer, but another said it was great.

Thanks for checking — going back to what we discussed, Frankie & Bennys in the South Part can be convenient if your sights are toward that side of town, but central sights might be a bit farther. Would you like me to pull up Italian options closer to the main sights or near your hotel?
No, I think that Frankie and Bennys is just right. Do you want to make a reservation?
Perfect, Frankie & Bennys in the South Part it is. I’ll book a table for two at 7:00 PM—thank you, that helps a lot. <END> bye
